Package org.apache.nutch.clustering.carrot2

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Clusterer
    This plugin provides an implementation of OnlineClusterer extension using clustering components of the Carrot2 project (http://www.carrot2.org).
    HitsClusterAdapter
    An adapter of Carrot2's RawCluster interface to HitsCluster interface.
    NutchDocument
    An adapter class that implements RawDocument required for Carrot2.
    NutchInputComponent
    An input component that ignores the query passed from the controller and instead looks for data stored in the request context.
